data.comment: The match is underway in Kansas City.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Johnny Russell. The finish is off target, however.
Drew Fischer awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City's Gianluca Busio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 6, Minnesota push upfield but Drew Fischer quickly pulls them for offside.
In Kansas City Minnesota drive forward through Jan Gregus. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Kansas City.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Johnny Russell gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 16, Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Gerso Fernandes for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 16, Minnesota have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Jan Gregus (Minnesota) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 23, Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
Minnesota are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 24, Gerso Fernandes for Kansas City is whistled offside.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 25, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Kansas City are coming forward and Roger Espinoza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Drew Fischer awards Minnesota a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Goal! Kevin Molino gives Minnesota a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Emanuel Reynoso.
Minnesota awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City.
In the minute 31, Kansas City are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kansas City drive upfield and Gerso Fernandes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
In the minute 32, Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
Drew Fischer signals a Kansas City throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Robin Lod for Minnesota drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kevin Molino puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 35, Great play from Emanuel Reynoso to set up the goal.
Drew Fischer signals a Kansas City throw-in in Minnesota's half.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Minnesota.
Minnesota move into a 0-3 lead through a Bakaye Dibassy header.
Emanuel Reynoso instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 41, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Minnesota pushes forward through Jan Gregus, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 42, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Emanuel Reynoso (Minnesota) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Minnesota push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Ethan Finlay gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kansas City defence.
In the minute 44, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
At Children's Mercy Park, Minnesota are penalized for being offside.
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Kansas City.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 51, Minnesota to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 53, Kansas City's Johnny Russell gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Kansas City.
In the minute 55, Minnesota drives forward and Kevin Molino gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Minnesota needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
The home team have replaced Amadou Dia with Luis Martins. This is the first substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
In the minute 56, Peter Vermes is making the team's second substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Gadi Kinda replacing Gianluca Busio.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Minnesota.
Jan Gregus (Minnesota) has received a yellow card from Drew Fischer.
In the minute 59, Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Kansas City.
In the minute 62, In Kansas City Minnesota drive forward through Emanuel Reynoso. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Important block from the Minnesota defence as Roger Espinoza fires in a strike for Kansas City.
Khiry Shelton gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
In the minute 63, Chase Gasper is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Chase Gasper for Minnesota is back on the field again.
In the minute 65, Kansas City's Luis Martins breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Free kick Minnesota.
Minnesota's Emanuel Reynoso is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City just outside Minnesota's area.
In the minute 68, Erik Hurtado is on a sub for Gerso Fernandes for Kansas City.
Kansas City's Johnny Russell gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Minnesota defender.
In the minute 69, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Kansas City advance rapidly upfield but Drew Fischer blows for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
In the minute 72, Minnesota make their first substitution with Hassani Dotson replacing Osvaldo Alonso.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 74, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
Ball safe as Minnesota is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Kansas City's Erik Hurtado gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Felipe Hernandez is replacing Roger Espinoza for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Emanuel Reynoso with Marlon Hairston.
In the minute 80, Minnesota's Chase Gasper has been booked in Kansas City.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In the minute 82, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Bakaye Dibassy (Minnesota) has received a first yellow card.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Minnesota's area.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Marlon Hairston is booked for the away team.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kansas City Minnesota attack through Robin Lod. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Drew Fischer awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
In the minute 88, Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Minnesota's half?
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jacori Hayes is replacing Kevin Molino for the away team.
Drew Fischer signals a Minnesota throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Luis Martins for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
Minnesota will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
